assignment.title: Introduction to AI Concepts
assignment.objective: Familiarize yourself with basic AI concepts and terms and explore applications in real-world scenarios.
assignment.submissionInstructions: Submit a document detailing your research and tools explored, including summaries and descriptions.

tasks.title: Summarize AI Applications
tasks.description: Write a brief paragraph summarizing an AI application in an industry of your choice.

steps.title: Research Current AI Applications
steps.description: Find three current applications of AI in different industries and write a summary of each.

steps.title: Select an AI Tool to Explore
steps.description: Choose an AI tool such as TensorFlow and describe its main use cases and features.

checkForUnderstanding.question: What are some industries where AI is applied?
Name an AI tool you explored.

subsections.title: What is Artificial Intelligence?
subsections.content: Artificial Intelligence (AI) is the simulation of human intelligence processes by machines, particularly computer systems. These processes include learning (the acquisition of information and rules for using it), reasoning (using rules to reach approximate or definite conclusions), and self-correction.

quizzes.question: What is Artificial Intelligence?
options: Simulation of human intelligence by machines
quizzes.answer: Simulation of human intelligence by machines

subsections.title: Brief History of AI
subsections.content: The idea of inanimate objects endowed with intelligence has been around since ancient times. The formal start of AI as a field was marked by a conference at Dartmouth College in 1956. Over the years, AI has gone through several cycles of enthusiasm and setbacks until it reached modern advancements powered by data and enhanced algorithms.

quizzes.question: When did AI start formally as a field?

subsections.title: Key Components of AI
subsections.content: AI systems typically require large datasets to train machine learning models. Key components include datasets, algorithms, computing power, and purpose-built software frameworks.

quizzes.question: What are key components of an AI system?

subsections.title: AI Tools and Applications
subsections.content: AI is applied in numerous domains, including healthcare, automotive, finance, and entertainment. Tools such as TensorFlow and PyTorch are popular among developers for creating AI applications and training machine learning models.

quizzes.question: Which of these is an AI tool?
